# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Psychologist [italic]This job is primarily for roleplay and not considered as important as other roles.[/italic]
The Psychologist is responsible for providing psychological support to the crew. They can achieve this by talking to the crew, and helping them with their mental health.
## Do - Talk to the crew. - Help them with their mental health.
## Don't - Ignore the crew and let them suffer.
